title: How to Quickly Peel a Tomato

steps.headline: Bring a pot of water to a rolling boil.
Slightly score across the base of the tomato in a cross fashion.
steps.description: Then drop one tomato at a time in the boiling water. Leave for about 20 seconds.

steps.headline: Evacuate each tomato to a bowl of ice water.
steps.description: Leave long enough for the tomato to cool.

steps.headline: Use a knife to make a cut around the "equator" of the tomato.
steps.description: The "northern hemisphere" and "southern hemisphere" of the tomato will now slide off intact.

text: Bring a pot of water to a rolling boil.  Slightly score across the base of the tomato in a cross fashion. Then drop one tomato at a time in the boiling water. Leave for about 20 seconds. Evacuate each tomato to a bowl of ice water. Leave long enough for the tomato to cool. Use a knife to make a cut around the "equator" of the tomato. The "northern hemisphere" and "southern hemisphere" of the tomato will now slide off intact.
